As your business expands across borders, the risks grow too. Are you prepared?

Join us at the Multinational Risk Forum 2024, hosted by Marsh, where industry leaders and experts will delve into the growing risks associated with multi-country exposures. This exclusive forum is designed to equip you with the knowledge to protect your business and unlock new opportunities in a dynamic, multi-jurisdictional landscape.

*	Date: Thursday, 21st November 2024
*	Time: 09:00 AM to 01:00 PM (GST)
*	Location: Sofitel Downtown, Dubai, UAE 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

chunks.text:
*	Date: Thursday, 21st November 2024
*	Time: 09:00 AM to 01:00 PM (GST)
*	Location: Sofitel Downtown, Dubai, UAE 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Register Now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.marsh.com%2Fen-gb%2Finsights%2Fevents%2Fmultinational-risk-forum-2024.html&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca77ad5c70a7f4827980508dcf4016bf3%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653534181108011%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AMc5GjECKa%2FtwEHvXbT838OCVglWtxLINPnawsECEq0%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Agenda:

 

9:00 AM - Registration & Coffee

9:30 AM - Introduction to Speakers and Panel

9:40 AM - Climate Change & NATCAT: Am I Protected?

10:10 AM - Political Risk: Is My Business Impacted?

10:25 AM - People Risk in a Multinational Environment

10:45 AM - Coffee Break

11:00 AM - Decoding Regulations, Contracts, and Tax Norms

11:20 AM - Panel Discussion with Risk Managers & Experts

12:00 PM - Closing Comments by Paralympic Champion

12:20 PM - Networking & Lunch

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Don’t miss this opportunity to gain invaluable insights from industry leaders and network with professionals managing the same challenges.

Kev

As your business expands across borders, the risks grow too. Are you prepared?

Join us at the Multinational Risk Forum 2024, hosted by Marsh, where industry leaders and experts will delve into the growing risks associated with multi-country exposures. This exclusive forum is designed to equip you with the knowledge to protect your business and unlock new opportunities in a dynamic, multi-jurisdictional landscape.

*	Date: Thursday, 21st November 2024
*	Time: 09:00 AM to 01:00 PM (GST)
*	Location: Sofitel Downtown, Dubai, UAE 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
